text_en: Body changes are a sign that you are growing into an adult male or female. But they are not a sign to start sex
text_sw: Mabadiliko ya mwili ni ishara kwamba unakuwa mtu mzima. Lakini haina maana ya kuanza kufanya ngono.

text_en: Menstration means that your body is becoming more mature. But it does not mean you are ready to have a baby.
text_sw: Kuanza hedhi kuna maanisha kwamba mwili wako unakomaa zaidi. Lakini haina maana kwamba uko tayari kupata mtoto.

text_en: Say no to gifts for sex
text_sw: Kataa zawadi zenye mrengo wa kingono.
Epuka akina baba na akina mama wazinifu.
